AGRO.BA.summary: Agrometal S.A.I. manufactures and sells agricultural seeders in Argentina. It provides ADX Air Drill fine and coarse grain seeders; APX precision coarse grain planters with air drill systems; TX MEGA coarse grain seeders with pneumatic and mechanical systems; MXY II and MX MAX coarse and pastures seeders; TX PIVOT II, self-transporting precision coarse grain seeders; and XZ fine grain and pasture seeders, as well as hydro-pneumatic actuators. The company was formerly known as Agrometal S.R.L and changed its name to Agrometal S.A.I. in 1957. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Monte MaÃ­z, Argentina.
